channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 克里姆林宫拒绝讨论彭博社关于中国银行收紧对俄罗斯人的限制的报道
item.description: The Kremlin declined to comment on Tuesday on a Bloomberg report that Chinese state-owned banks are tightening curbs on funding to Russian clients for fear of U.S. secondary sanctions, describing it as a highly sensitive topic.翻译:克里姆林宫周二拒绝对彭博社的一篇报道发表评论，该报道称，由于担心美国的二次制裁，中国国有银行正在收紧对俄罗斯客户的融资限制，称这是一个高度敏感的话题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 周二达沃斯有什么值得期待的
item.description: The main business of the World Economic Forum kicks off on Tuesday with a speech by Chinese premier Li Qiang top of the agenda.翻译:世界经济论坛的主要议题周二拉开帷幕，中国总理李强的演讲成为首要议题。
item.author: Leela De Kretser

item.title: 韩国和美国将在美国大选前提前开始国防费用谈判-媒体
item.description: South Korea and the United States have agreed to start early talks on how to share the cost of keeping U.S. forces in the country in a bid to reach a deal before the possible reelection of Donald Trump as president, local media reported on Tuesday.翻译:据当地媒体周二报道，韩国和美国已同意就如何分担驻韩美军的成本展开早期谈判，以便在唐纳德·特朗普可能连任总统之前达成协议。
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 一些较富裕的中国人表示，随着经济放缓，他们买不起婚姻
item.description: Victor Li is determined to get married soon, but like many other young Chinese grappling with an uncertain economic outlook, the well-heeled Shanghai entrepreneur isn't sure he can afford to.翻译:李泽楷决心尽快结婚，但像许多其他面临不确定经济前景的中国年轻人一样，这位富有的上海企业家不确定自己是否负担得起。
item.author: Nicoco Chan

item.title: 台总理称内阁将按照以往惯例辞职
item.description: Taiwan Premier Chen Chien-jen said on Tuesday that the Cabinet will resign in accordance with past constitutional practice before the new parliament meets next month after the ruling party lost its majority in the legislature.翻译:台湾行政院院长陈建仁周二表示，在执政党失去立法院多数席位后，内阁将在下个月新立法院召开前按照以往宪法惯例辞职。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日本东电将于二月下旬开始第四次释放福岛核电站水
item.description: Tokyo Electric Power Company (Tepco) plans to start a fourth release of treated radioactive water from the wrecked Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant in late February, an official said on Tuesday, continuing a move criticised by China.翻译:周二，一名官员表示，东京电力公司 (Tepco) 计划于 2 月下旬开始第四次排放来自受损福岛第一核电站的处理过的放射性水，此举继续受到中国批评。
item.author: Katya Golubkova

item.title: 固态：电动汽车巨头追逐电池的“圣杯”
item.description: Solid-state batteries hold the promise of more energy storage, longer driving ranges and faster charging for next-generation electric vehicles. Yet despite decades of research and billions of dollars invested, their future still looks elusive.翻译:固态电池有望为下一代电动汽车提供更多的能量存储、更长的行驶里程和更快的充电速度。然而，尽管经过数十年的研究和数十亿美元的投资，它们的未来仍然显得难以捉摸。
item.author: Eric Onstad

item.title: 中国经济陷入困境，李克强总理将在达沃斯发表讲话
item.description: Chinese Premier Li Qiang is set to address global investors and politicians in Davos on Tuesday, as Beijing grapples with a sluggish post-pandemic recovery and a real estate slump.翻译:中国总理李强将于周二在达沃斯向全球投资者和政界人士发表讲话，目前北京正努力应对疫情后复苏缓慢和房地产市场低迷的问题。
item.author: Antoni Slodkowski

item.title: 大众汽车及其竞争对手正在努力攻克固态电池难题
item.description: Volkswagen, whose drive to develop a "solid-state" electric car battery with U.S. startup QuantumScape has been dogged by delays, is casting its net wider in pursuit of the potentially game-changing technology.翻译:大众汽车与美国初创公司 QuantumScape 合作开发“固态”电动汽车电池的计划一直被拖延，但该公司正在扩大网络，以追求可能改变游戏规则的技术。
item.author: Eric Onstad, Paul Lienert

item.title: 太平洋国家齐聚中国讨论海军问题
item.description: Naval officials from countries bordering the Pacific, such as Japan, Russia and the United States, are meeting from Tuesday in China's eastern city of Nanjing to discuss updating rules on unexpected encounters, among other issues, state media said.翻译:官方媒体称，日本、俄罗斯和美国等太平洋沿岸国家的海军官员将于周二在中国东部城市南京举行会议，讨论更新有关意外遭遇的规则等问题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 新疆雪崩致约1000名游客被困
item.description: The tourists remain stranded in a remote holiday village after avalanches hit China's northwestern Xinjiang region with metres-high snow and fickle weather impeding evacuation.翻译:雪崩袭击了中国西北部的新疆地区，积雪高达数米，天气变化无常，阻碍了疏散，游客们仍被困在一个偏远的度假村里。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国在台湾就职前夕进行等待游戏
item.description: China's muted response to the weekend victory by Taiwan President-elect Lai Ching-te signals what some analysts see as the start of an uneasy four months before he takes office, with Beijing treading carefully before then.翻译:中国对台湾当选总统赖清德上周末的胜利反应冷淡，这表明一些分析人士认为，这是他上任前四个月不安的开始，而北京方面在此之前小心行事。
item.author: Laurie Chen, Yew Lun Tian

item.title: 碧桂园预计2024年中国房地产市场将持续疲软
item.description: China's largest private property developer, Country Garden, 2007.HK expects the property market will remain weak in 2024 and the company could face more, "severe" challenges, its top management said.翻译:中国最大的私人房地产开发商碧桂园，2007.HK 高层表示，预计 2024 年房地产市场将持续疲软，该公司可能面临更多“严峻”挑战。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台积电Q4利润下滑23% 今年重点关注需求反弹
item.description: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co Ltd , is expected to report a 23% drop in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, but analysts predict better growth this year on the back of rebounding demand.翻译:台积电周四预计第四季度利润下降 23%，但分析师预计，由于需求反弹，今年的增长将有所改善。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国警告菲律宾不要因总统台湾言论“玩火”
item.description: China summoned the ambassador from the Philippines on Tuesday and warned the country "not to play with fire" after President Ferdinand Marcos Jr congratulated Taiwan's president-elect Lai Ching-te on his election victory.翻译:在小费迪南德·马科斯总统祝贺台湾当选总统赖清德当选后，中国周二召见菲律宾大使，警告菲律宾“不要玩火”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国谴责瑙鲁“不幸”放弃台湾，并对中国的承诺发出警告
item.description: The U.S. official who heads the body that handles unofficial ties with Taiwan on Tuesday decried Nauru's "unfortunate" decision to break ties with Taipei shortly after an election and warned that Beijing's promises often go unfulfilled.翻译:周二，负责处理与台湾非正式关系的机构负责人的美国官员谴责瑙鲁在选举后不久做出与台北断绝关系的“不幸”决定，并警告说北京的承诺往往没有兑现。
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 股市下滑，美元因利率前景紧张而上涨
item.description: World shares slipped and the dollar and U.S. bond yields rose on Tuesday as hawkish remarks from central bank policymakers in Europe contributed to markets reducing bets that global interest rate cuts could come as early as March.翻译:周二，世界股市下跌，美元和美国债券收益率上涨，因欧洲央行政策制定者的强硬言论导致市场减少了全球最早可能在 3 月份降息的押注。
item.author: Alun John, Tom Westbrook

item.title: 格鲁吉亚执政党领导人访华推动深化双边关系
item.description: The leader of Georgia's ruling party began a six-day visit to China on Monday, as the European Union candidate member country seeks to deepen its relations with Beijing, Georgian media reported.翻译:据格鲁吉亚媒体报道，格鲁吉亚执政党领导人周一开始对中国进行为期六天的访问，这个欧盟候选成员国寻求深化与北京的关系。
item.author: Felix Light

item.title: 玩具制造商从中国转移并非易事
item.description: Toy makers grappling with surging costs in China are finding no easy options when it comes to shifting production to cheaper places.翻译:正在努力应对中国成本飙升的玩具制造商在将生产转移到更便宜的地方时没有找到简单的选择。
item.author: Richa Naidu

item.title: 中国与瑞士签署扩大贸易宣言
item.description: China and Switzerland signed a joint declaration on Monday agreeing to deepen their partnership after Premier Li Qiang met the Swiss President, the Swiss government said.翻译:瑞士政府表示，李强总理会见瑞士总统后，中国和瑞士周一签署了一份联合声明，同意深化合作伙伴关系。
item.author: Reuters
